Columns.Description: OpsManager for all records of this type.
Columns.Name: SourceSystem

Columns.Description: Date and time the computer group was created or updated.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: Name of the source that the group was collected from. For Active Directory this is the domain name.
Columns.Name: GroupSourceName

Columns.Description: Source that group was collected from. Possible values are ActiveDirectory WSUSWSUSClientTargeting.
Columns.Name: GroupSource

Columns.Description: Full path to the group including the source and source name.
Columns.Name: GroupFullName

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
